#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int n,i,j,t;
    long long arr[1010],sum;
    arr[1]=1;
    arr[2]=1;
    for(i=3;i<=1001;i++)
    {
        sum=0;
        for(j=1;j<i;j++)
        sum+=(arr[j]*arr[i-j])%10000;

        arr[i]=sum%10000;
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%lld\n",arr[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
